Package com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.maxent

Maximum entropy implementation for machine learning, wrapping OpenNLP MaxEnt.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OpenNLPModel
    An Apache OpenNLP model wrapper interface
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MaxentModelTrainer
    Trains a MaxEnt machine learning model for a given CorpusEventStream.
    Uses the Apache OpenNLP OpenMaxent implementation.
    MaximumEntropyModel
    A wrapper for a maxent model and the features used to train it - useful since the same features need to be used when evaluating on the basis on this model.

Package com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.maxent Description

Maximum entropy implementation for machine learning, wrapping OpenNLP MaxEnt.
